author: John L. Stanley
comment: It's hard to see more than a sentence or two at a time.  Why format the text so it only fills half of a tiny watch screen??  Would be 5 stars if the text would fill the screen.  This would also benefit from a history (list of recently searched subjects) and maybe a small cache (to save battery by not having to xfer the same material a 2nd time).
title: Mildly frustrating

author: bob manfredonia
comment: AFTER UPDATE STILL GIVES  UNABLE TO CONNECT MESSAGE...Completes voice search of intended article, but then gives a connection error, and freezes, every time...... LG Urbane. If updated and corrected, then yes, it would be a solid app.

reply.author: Dheera Venkatraman
reply.content: Sorry for the trouble -- it's a bit hard to debug without all the various devices in hand, but I'm working at it. Please try again now and contact me if it still doesn't work. Thanks!

title: Not quite complete.

author: Sean Patrick
comment: The best Smartwatch I have seen on any OS. Great info right on your wrist!  My only complaint is that there are large borders (a lot of wasted screen space) when you get to reading the text. UPDATE - Connection issue resolved! Thank you, Dheera! On my Sony Smartwatch 3 I keep receiving a connection failed message trying to load more info after initial search
title: Resolved fantastic app!

comment: I get this message every time, even though I can connect with other apps. Not sure if it's an issue with the brand new version of wear or what...Moto 360  EDIT: Switched to a Galaxy S6 and all Android wear apps I've had an issue with, are no longer an issue.  Thanks!

reply.author: Dheera Venkatraman
reply.content: Sorry for the trouble -- it's a bit hard to debug without all the various devices in hand, but I'm working at it. Please try again now and contact me if it still doesn't work. Thanks!

comment: Gives me "connection failed" message when i press on any article to open it. Liked the concept but it's useless for me because of this bug.
title: Connection Failed

author: Joann Bogacki
comment: I had high hopes for this app,  but can't get past the google search.  I emailed the dev...got no response.  I will give it another chance....otherwise,  uninstalling.

author: pseudosoul.
comment: This is an amazing Wikipedia client for Android Wear. My only issue with Attopedia is how it uses Google Voice Recognition, a keyboard WITH a voice option would've been better, since it sometimes struggles with accurate recognition.
title: Good.

author: Laura Luwho
comment: Seems like a wonderful app if it would work. I continue to get the error message of 'Unable to connect to phone.'
title: Error message: Unable to connect to phone

author: Mikael Lagler
comment: It used to work for me on my LG watch urbane, but on my moto 360 sport it doesn't work. It'll recognize my voice but then keep spinning as if it's loading and then return to the search page after a few seconds. Android wear  version 6.0.1
title: Not working

comment: Works great makes it easy to browse Wikipedia from your watch and I no longer have to pull up my phone to win all my arguments.

Unfortunately, this amazingly well-designed and bug-free application, is no longer available to me. In short...    plz fix....
